name: Punchlime
tag_list: accelerator, business, startup, entrepreneurs, funding, venture-capital, strategic-consultancy, business-process-optimization
overview:
Punchlime’s Global Acceleration & Funding help exceptional entrepreneurs and investors succeed in making meaning and money.

At Punchlime we believe that making meaning and money simultaneously are the best ingredients to success. We are not afraid to challenge the status quo. If something hasn’t been done before, we are comfortable being the first.

Through our unique hybrid model on business development and investment, we partner with Internet based startups and growth stage companies to scale in an efficient and sustainable way. We engage with technology companies as early as the efficiency stage all the way through growth.

We are based both in the U.S and Europe, have been working together for many years and recently joined forces again under the umbrella of Punchlime, founded early 2012. Punchlime’s diverse international team has more than 15 years of combined experience at Google U.S. and Europe, and 20 years of corporate venture investing experience in Silicon Valley and beyond.

Our team has been active individually with early stage companies as entrepreneurs, advisors and board members throughout our careers including:

  • led investments and coached management teams in several startups in particular in real-time Big Data, SaaS managed services, web security and ecommerce
  • worked on small startup teams and multi­-million ­dollar digital media campaigns in B2C and B2B segments
  • founded Heritage Bank in Silicon Valley to a successful IPO on the NASDAQ exchange
